Package com.example.the_tarlords.data.QR

Class QRCode

java.lang.Object
com.example.the_tarlords.data.QR.QRCode
public class QRCode extends Object
QRCode class provides functionalities for generating, sharing, and managing QR codes

  • Method Details

    • makeQR

      public void makeQR(String eventID)
      Generates new QR code for a given event ID and stores it in Firebase
      Parameters:
      eventID - The ID of the event associated with the QR code

    • makeNewDocID

      public void makeNewDocID()
      Generates a new unique document ID for the QR code

    • sendToFirebase

      public void sendToFirebase(String eventID)
      Sends the QR code details to Firebase
      Parameters:
      eventID - The ID of the event associated with the QR code

    • generateQR

      public static void generateQR(String text, android.widget.ImageView imageView)
      Generates a QR code bitmap from the given text and sets it to the specified ImageView
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be encoded into the QR code
      imageView - The ImageView where the generated QR code will be displayed

    • shareQR

      public void shareQR(android.widget.ImageView imageView, android.app.Activity activity)
      Shares the QR code image stored in the specified ImageView
      Parameters:
      imageView - The ImageView containing the QR code image
      activity - The activity context for starting the share action

    • reuseQR

      public void reuseQR(String user, String sel_event, String new_eventId)
      Reuses a QR code from one event to another
      Parameters:
      user - The organizer's user ID
      sel_event - The name of the selected event
      new_eventId - The ID of the new event to which the QR code will be linked

    • replaceQR

      public void replaceQR(String QRId, String eventID)
      Replaces the QR code's event ID with a new event ID, helper function to reuseQR
      Parameters:
      QRId - The ID of the QR code to be replaced
      eventID - The ID of the new event to which the QR code will be linked

    • findPastEvents

      public void findPastEvents(String user, QRCode.EventsCallback callback)
      Finds past events organized by a specific user and returns them via a callback
      Parameters:
      user - The user ID of the organizer
      callback - The callback to be invoked when events are loaded

    • pastEvent

      public boolean pastEvent(String endDate, String endTime)
      Checks if an event has already occurred based on its start date and end time
      Parameters:
      endDate - The end date of the event
      endTime - The end time of the event
      Returns:
      True if the event has passed; otherwise, false

    • getQrID

      public String getQrID()
      Retrieves the QR code ID
      Returns:
      The QR code ID

    • setQrID

      public void setQrID(String new_qr)
